lesson.title: CDN Architecture and Edge Computing
lesson.summary: CDNs distribute content across geographically dispersed servers to reduce latency and improve user experience globally.
lesson.real_world_example: Cloudflare operates 250+ data centers globally to serve static content with minimal latency
lesson.mermaid_diagram:
graph TD
    User1[User US] --> Edge1[US Edge Server]
    User2[User EU] --> Edge2[EU Edge Server]
    Edge1 --> Origin[Origin Server]
    Edge2 --> Origin
